|nickname = Assumptionistas, Assumptionist |affiliations = ACUP, APSA, CEAP,

'Assumption Antipolo' (Abbreviation: AA) located in the city of Antipolo, Rizal,
Philippines, is a private, Catholic, college-preparatory school for girls.
categories: Roman Catholic elementary schools in the Philippines
Roman Catholic secondary schools in the Philippines
